select
distinct
from po
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT po.*,flag.status FROM po,flag WHERE po.flag = flag.flag and flag.flag = 2
SELECT po.*,flag.status FROM po,flag WHERE po.flag = flag.flag and flag.flag = 3
